3: I'm safe! Luckily I detonated the weapon in time...
Browning...?
There's only his head left...
This is all a trap... What's happening to Lucia and the rest of them?!
Comms request.
Lucia! Something's gone really wrong with Browning! There's no distractor! It's all a setup! Don't approach the Golden Vortex building, you're all in danger!
The comms of all the teams sent by Babylonia are getting interfered with, including the Gray Ravens'.
Bianca!
You've made a mess of yourself again. You shouldn't continue the mission in your current state.
I'm sorry.
Why is Babylonia sending in the Purifying Force? Does it mean that... there's a Construct in that building?!
That's not it. My target's not inside the Golden Vortex.
We've set up a temporary base inside the desert—here are the coordinates. I hope you can get yourself fixed up when you get there.
Please don't say something like that to me! I can still fight!
Even though... even though my weapon is destroyed, I can still help out in other ways...
I can follow you and protect you! I can do it, I promise!
Liv, you and I belong to different teams. I have no authority over what you do, but as a fellow warrior of Babylonia, I hope you'll grow—not just stronger...
But wiser as well. If you insist on operating in this state, not only will you hurt yourself, you'll endanger other squads as well.
So consider what I said, alright?
...I understand now. I'll head to the base immediately...
Liv...
Yes?
Don't forget to check your Inver-Device when you get there.
I won't forget it! Thanks.
(Turns and leaves)...
Better keep it to myself.
If she knew I'm here to save her commandant, she would have followed me no matter how hurt she was.
